title: The Great Defender cinema slide
creator_credit: Thomas Bentley, Associated British Picture Corporation and British Instructional Films
credit_line: ACMI has endeavoured to contact the owners of these objects since their deposit in 2015. Unfortunately this has been unsuccessful. We would welcome any information to identify the owners.
brief_description: Two glass sheets: one glass only and the other with slide imagery which has a monochromatic emulsion that has then been hand painted with coloured pigments or dye. TEXT on the slide reads: British International Pictures present Matheson Lang Margaret Bannerman. Richard Bird The Great Defender Smashing Sensation - Seething Drama of Unrequited Love.. And the Law Courts! Released by British Empire Films Ltd Not suitable for general exhibition. Coming It looks as if handwritten text has worn away as there are very faint black marks remaining.
